definition: Nursultan Nazarbayev (1940-), president of Kazakhstan
pinyin: Na4 zha1 er3 ba1 ye1 fu1

definition: surname Na
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
to prick/to run or stick (a needle etc) into/jug (a classifier for liquids such as beer)
to tie/to bind/classifier for flowers, banknotes etc: bundle/Taiwan pr. [zha2]
variant of 紮|扎[za1]
penetrating (as of cold)/struggle
variant of 紮|扎[zha1]
variant of 爾|尔[er3]
thus/so/like that/you/thou
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
final particle indicating enthusiasm etc
interrogative particle (classical)
(phonetic ye)
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)
husband/man/manual worker/conscripted laborer (old)

sentences.english: The term of Mr Nazarbayev was due to end in late 2012.
sentences.chinese: 纳扎尔巴耶夫先生将于2012年底任满。

sentences.english: If the campaign succeeded, it would be Nursultan Nazarbayev of the fourth term.
sentences.chinese: 如果竞选成功，这将是纳扎尔巴耶夫的第四任期。

sentences.english: Nazarbayev said the two countries share the tradition of close friendship.
sentences.chinese: 纳扎尔巴耶夫表示，哈中两国拥有亲密友好的传统。

sentences.english: President Nazarbayev will also visit Tianjin during his stay in China.
sentences.chinese: 访华期间，纳扎尔巴耶夫总统还将赴天津市参观访问。
纳扎尔巴耶夫强调民族的宽容性。

sentences.english: In domestic politics, however, Nazarbayev has faltered.
sentences.chinese: 但是对于国内政治，纳扎尔巴耶夫踌躇了。

sentences.english: Nazarbayev said that the connotation of Kazakhstan-China cooperation gets increasingly enriched.
sentences.chinese: 纳扎尔巴耶夫说，哈中合作的内涵不断充实。

sentences.english: But Mr Nazarbayev has turned down parliament’s petition.
sentences.chinese: 然而，纳扎尔巴耶夫拒绝了议会的呈请。

sentences.english: Nursultan Nazarbayev, the end of this term in 2012.
sentences.chinese: 纳扎尔巴耶夫此任将于2012年结束。

sentences.english: At 70, Nazarbayev is eager for a place in history as the father of his country.
sentences.chinese: 70岁的纳扎尔巴耶夫期望作为国家之父而永垂青史。

definition: Aleksandr Grigoryevich Lukachenko, president of Belarus from 1994
Yeltsin (name)/Boris Yeltsin (1931-2007) first post-communist president of Russia 1991-1999
Medvedyev (name)/Dmitry Anatolyevich Medvedev (1965-), Russian lawyer and politician, president of Russian Federation from 2008
Vladimir Putin (1952-), president of Russia
Gorbachev/Mikhail Sergeyevich Gorbachev (1931-), last president of the Soviet Union 1991-1995
Erdogan (name)/Recep Tayyip Erdoğan (1954-), Turkish politician, prime minister from 2003
Hamid Karzai (1957-), Afghan politician, president 2004-2014
Bashir (name)/Omar Hassan Ahmad al-Bashir (1944-), Sudanese military man and politician, president of Sudan from 1993
Mohammed Abdel Rahman Abdel Raouf Arafat al-Qudwa al-Husseini (1929-2004), Palestinian leader, popularly known as Yasser Arafat 亞西爾·阿拉法特|亚西尔·阿拉法特[Ya4 xi1 er3 · A1 la1 fa3 te4]
King Mohammed VI (King of Morocco)
pinyin: Mu4 han3 mo4 de2 liu4 shi4

definition: Russian Federation, RSFSR
Robert Mugabe (1924-), Zimbabwean ZANU-PF politician, president of Zimbabwe 1987-2017
Pervez Musharraf (1943-), Pakistani general and politician, president 2001-2008
Khamenei, Ayatollah Aly (1939-), Supreme Leader of Iran, aka Ali Khamenei
Modi (name)/Narendra Modi (1950-), Indian BJP (Bharatiya Janata Party or Indian People's Party) politician, Gujarat Chief Minister from 2001, PM from 2014
president (of a country)/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2],屆|届[jie4]
